title: How do you get levels ups in the forum?
body: I tried to look up different posts to gain levels in the forum but it was not really clear to me how to gain levels at all. Hopefully you guys can give me some tips on leveling up, Thank you.

replies.body:
By posting, upvoting / downvoting etc.

You're all leveled up now! Congrats!
Wow really this was very helpful thank you so much :D

Just to be clear, your boards level and Summoner level are linked together. You can't level up your boards account separate from your Summoner level. When you posted here, it forced them to sync up with each other. From now on when you level up your Summoner in the client, this boards profile will level up as well.
Thanks for clearing up the misunderstanding Broporo this should help a lot of new people posting just like it helped me. :D
